quote: Fortunately, the United States has done very well since Election Day last November 8th…  Companies are moving back, creating job growth the likes of which our country has not seen in a very long time.
quotePlain: Fortunately, the United States has done very well since Election Day last November 8th…  Companies are moving back, creating job growth the likes of which our country has not seen in a very long time.
name: Donald Trump
where: speech to the United Nations General Assembly

checks.quote: The jobs gains under Trump were actually lower than each of the last six years of February-to-August job gains for Obama except for one year, 2012.
checks.quotePlain: The jobs gains under Trump were actually lower than each of the last six years of February-to-August job gains for Obama except for one year, 2012.

checks.quote: In fact, the job gains have been fewer under Trump than they were during the same time frame in each of the previous four years.
checks.quotePlain: In fact, the job gains have been fewer under Trump than they were during the same time frame in each of the previous four years.

claims.title: job growth much greater under Trump than previous administrations
claims.negative: job growth under Trump has been lower than recent years under Obama
claims.negativePlain: job growth under Trump has been lower than recent years under Obama
claims.truth: Job growth under Trump for February thru March has actually been lower than every year in Obama's 2nd term.
claims.truthPlain: Job growth under Trump for February thru March has actually been lower than every year in Obama’s 2nd term.
